name: Enum definition
prompt:
Add a public enum called Status to Enums.calr with values Pending, InProgress, and Completed.

Use this exact Calor enum definition syntax:
§EN{e001:Status:pub}
  Pending
  InProgress
  Completed
§/EN{e001}

The §EN{id:name:visibility} syntax defines an enum:
- id is a unique enum identifier
- name is the enum type name
- visibility is pub/priv/int
- Each line inside is an enum member
- Members get automatic integer values starting from 0
